mapper.select: select * from(select row_number() over(order by boardNum desc)as rnum,boardNum,writer,title,content,writeDate,hit from TestBoard order by boardNum desc) where rnum between(#{curPage}-1)*5+1 and ((#{curPage}-1)*5+1)+5-1
mapper.update: update TestBoard set hit = hit+1 where boardNum=#{boardNum}
update TESTBOARD set WRITER = #{writer},TITLE = #{title} , CONTENT = #{content} where BOARDNUM=#{boardNum}
